thread.title: 8 Times Kangana Brought Sari Back During Rangoon Promotions
thread.title_full: 8 Times Kangana Brought Sari Back During Rangoon Promotions

title: 8 Times Kangana Brought Sari Back During Rangoon Promotions
text:
facebook 352 SHARES The promotions for Kangana Ranaut’s upcoming movie, Rangoon, are at its peak. The cast is making a visit to almost every show and event! While they do this, what the actors wear is quite important. And Kangana seems to have taken to saris which she is wearing in the most retro fashion possible, keeping up with her character in the film. Here we rounded the six saris she has worn so far! 1.This embellished number by Falguni and Shane Peacock 
2.This beautiful nine yards of floral chiffon 3.This golden wonder by Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla 
4.This second floral printed Sari by Shades of India 5.This ‘hearty’ Sari that is too adorable to be real 6.This one from Peró proving her undying love for florals 7.This one making her shine like a blue sapphire 8.This very beautiful mix of prints
